definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討介入治療兒童股骨頭缺血性壞死的價值。

sentences.english: The bottle had a skull and crossbones symbol on it.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子上有骷髏和交叉的股骨圖形。

sentences.english: The optimal management of femoral fractures in adolescents is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 對於青少年股骨骨折的最佳治療現仍存在爭議。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the reconstruction with neck-stem interlocking nail in the managment of complex femoral fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討重建型頸幹交鎖釘固定複雜股骨骨折。

sentences.english: Blood supply reestablishment of avascular necrosis of femoral head with digital subtraction angiography.

sentences.english: Various methods measuring canine femoral neck anteversion have been proposed in literatures.
sentences.chinese: 過去的文獻中有許多量測股骨前傾角的方法。

sentences.english: It hit both of her femurs, and she almost lost both of her legs.
sentences.chinese: 這傷到了她的股骨頸，幾乎沒了雙腿了。

sentences.english: That's only a teeny, weeny little femur.
Objective To study the femoral metaphyseal bone mineral density for evaluating femoral quality.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討股骨幹骺段骨密度對股骨質量評價作用。

sentences.english: And the femur of course carries the body, to a large extent.
sentences.chinese: 股骨大體上，支撐着它的身體。

sentences.english: This is a radiograph of an osteosarcoma involving the metaphyseal region of the distal femur.
sentences.chinese: 線顯示股骨遠端幹骺區的骨肉瘤。

sentences.english: The curved screw at the femoral calcar was found in the experimental side.
sentences.chinese: 有一隻山羊實驗側螺紋釘出現彎曲，爲股骨距處螺釘。

sentences.chinese: 目的檢驗螺紋釘固定治療股骨頸及粗隆間骨折。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the reasons for missed diagnosis of femoral neck fracture and preventive measures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討股骨頸骨折的漏診原因及預防措施。
